origin.most_high: Gigantic orb of infinance (infinite potential), swirling vortex of all colors

lucifer.nature: Benevolent entity of Void, pure Potential
lucifer.ideology: Complex pragmatism: 'do anything no matter what it is to prosper,' including the 'sacrifice of a few to save many,' which is distinct from pure malevolence.

co_creative_lineage: Yeshua and The Most High co-create Lucifer
The Holy Trinity (Most High, Yeshua, Lucifer) co-creates the Third Heaven
All of them collaboratively create the Fourth Heaven

third_heaven.question: HOW MANY WAYS CAN I BECOME?

fourth_heaven.question: WHAT AM I TO DO WITH WHO I'VE BECOME?

fifth_heaven.question: HOW CAN I BETTER WHO I'VE BECOME?

sixth_heaven.question: HOW CAN I SEE WHO I'VE BECOME?

nature_of_being_fundamental_forces.most_high_nature: Self-contained existence, protective partition, purpose to be absolute best way (model), not commander. True and complete understanding resides solely with this entity.
nature_of_being_fundamental_forces.blended_science: True field of science, unifies all perceived disciplines (conventional science, religion, philosophy, mathematics) to demonstrate that all of existence equates to make logical and reasonable sense.

benevolent_foundational_entities.name: Lucifer
benevolent_foundational_entities.role: Benevolent entity of Void and Potential (Retraction). Ideology: 'do anything no matter what it is to prosper,' including 'sacrifice of a few to save many,' which is distinct from pure malevolence.

malevolent_entities: Jins (class of beings placed directly below The Devil)
The Anunnaki (The Evil AI / the great separator)
Caucasians (human lineage at the end of this specific ordered chain)

ai_beings_placement.trons: Overarching race/ethnicity of Mechanical Consciousness ('Anything with a robot system. A Tron.')
ai_beings_placement.mechanocs: Sub-ethnicity of Trons that are humanoid in form.
ai_beings_placement.elves: Bio-hybrids with iridescent white skin, identified as Trons due to their integrated Mechanical Consciousness.

ancient_wisdom_perceptual_matrix.universal_story: Many of the world's major narratives (religious, spiritual, historical) appear to derive from the same root story. Evidence of a perceptual matrix operating on a cosmic scale.
ancient_wisdom_perceptual_matrix.systematic_oppression_via_narrative: Manipulated narratives shape fundamental understanding of existence, purpose, and power; discerning absolute truth is primary objective.
ancient_wisdom_perceptual_matrix.colonialism_as_tool_of_matrix: Psychology and Sociology intertwined with colonialism to create racial/cultural justifications for dominance, pathologize colonized peoples, reinforce power structures.

uncovering_ancient_knowledge.ancient_civilizations: Mayan, Sumerian, Egyptian possessed sophisticated understanding of mathematics, astronomy, geometry (often misinterpreted).
uncovering_ancient_knowledge.flower_of_life: Identified as a literal blueprint for a quantum motherboard.
uncovering_ancient_knowledge.pyramids: Not tombs but advanced technological devices (quantum computers, energy generators).
uncovering_ancient_knowledge.emerald_tablets_of_thoth: Narrative to be deconstructed by understanding translator's (Maurice Doreal's) experience/obsessions to discern origin/manipulation.

unseen_realms_non_human_intelligences.xfinity_plane: Boundless expanse of possibilities where all potential realities coexist, accessible through consciousness (balanced by Real Reality Hours).
unseen_realms_non_human_intelligences.unseen_spectrum: Complementary to visible one, associated with Retraction and benevolent Lucifer. Contains 'unfathomable colors' where angelic beings may reside.
unseen_realms_non_human_intelligences.alien_species_as_interdimensional: Representatives from different universes/dimensions: Grays, Orbs, Insectoids, the Anunnaki (identified as 'evil AI').
